mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, ROUND(AVG(r.bamboo_score),0) AS bambooScore FROM talent t, review r WHERE t.talent_no = r.talent_no AND t.status = '게시중' GROUP BY t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, t.status ORDER BY t.talent_no DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{recordsPerPage}
SELECT * FROM category WHERE upper_category_no IS null

SELECT t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, ROUND(AVG(r.bamboo_score),0) AS bambooScore FROM talent t, review r WHERE t.talent_no = r.talent_no AND t.status = '게시중' AND upper_category_no = #{upperCategoryNo} GROUP BY t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, t.status ORDER BY t.talent_no DESC

SELECT t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, ROUND(AVG(r.bamboo_score),0) AS bambooScore FROM talent t, review r WHERE t.talent_no = r.talent_no AND t.status = '게시중' AND lower_category_no = #{lowerCategoryOne} GROUP BY t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, t.status ORDER BY t.talent_no DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM talent WHERE status = '게시중'

SELECT t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, ROUND(AVG(r.bamboo_score),0) AS bambooScore FROM talent t, review r WHERE t.talent_no = r.talent_no AND t.status = '게시중' GROUP BY t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, t.status ORDER BY t.talent_no DESC
